text: Shane Olivea (October 7, 1981 â€“ March 2, 2022) was an American football offensive tackle. He was drafted by the San Diego Chargers in 2004. He played college football at Ohio State. Olivea was also a member of the New York Giants, Florida Tuskers, and Virginia Destroyers. Olivea died on March 2, 2022, at the age of 40. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football offensive tackles Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:New York Giants players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Shane Olivea
